entry.title: testing Octopress
entry.content:
how to detect cdrom device

    wodim --devices
        wodim: Overview of accessible drives (1 found) :
        -------------------------------------------------------------------------
         0  dev='/dev/sg1'      rwrw-- : 'TSSTcorp' 'DVD+-RW TS-H653B'
        -------------------------------------------------------------------------

gist embedding
